channel.title: ToS2399 - ɢᴀᴍᴇ ᴛʜʀᴇᴀᴅ - ɢᴀᴍᴇ ᴏᴠᴇʀ [ᴍᴀꜰɪᴀ ᴡɪɴꜱ] - ᴀᴡ ꜱʜɪᴛ, ʜᴇʀᴇ ᴡᴇ ɢᴏ ᴀɢᴀɪɴ
channel.description:
**ᴛᴏᴡɴ ᴏꜰ ꜱᴀʟᴇᴍ** **| 2399 |** **ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴇꜱᴏʟᴀᴛɪᴏɴ ᴏꜰ ꜱᴛᴏʀᴘ** ![image|690x388, 100%](upload://V7ICy8yzXuXMsT3v6P2WqkPqMp.jpeg) **ᴛʜᴇ ʏᴇᴀʀ ɪꜱ 2399. ᴢᴀɴᴅᴜ ꜱᴛᴏʀᴘ ᴊʀ. ɪꜱ ᴅᴇᴀᴅ. ᴛʜᴇ ꜱɪᴍᴜʟᴀᴛɪᴏɴ ɪɴ ᴡʜɪᴄʜ ʜᴜᴍᴀɴɪᴛʏ ɪꜱ ᴄᴏɴꜰɪɴᴇᴅ ʜᴀꜱ ʟᴏɴɢ ꜱɪɴᴄᴇ ʙᴇᴇɴ ᴀʙᴀɴᴅᴏɴᴇᴅ ʙʏ ᴛʜᴇ ᴍᴀᴄʜɪɴᴇꜱ. ꜱᴛᴏʀᴘ'ꜱ ᴋɴᴏᴡʟᴇᴅɢᴇ ᴏꜰ ᴛʜᴇ ꜱɪᴍᴜʟᴀᴛɪᴏɴ ᴀɴᴅ ʜɪꜱ ᴀᴛᴛᴇᴍᴘᴛꜱ ᴛᴏ ᴄʀᴇᴀᴛᴇ ᴀɴ ɪᴅᴇᴀʟ ᴡᴏʀʟᴅ ʙʏ ɪɴᴄᴏʀᴘᴏʀᴀᴛɪɴɢ ᴀɪꜱ ɪɴᴛᴏ ᴛʜᴇ ᴠᴇʀʏ ᴘʀᴏɢʀᴀᴍᴍɪɴɢ ᴏꜰ ᴛʜᴇ ᴘᴏᴄᴋᴇᴛ ʀᴇᴀʟɪᴛʏ ʜᴀᴠᴇ ʀᴇᴀᴄʜᴇᴅ ᴛʜᴇɪʀ ᴘᴇᴀᴋ.** **ᴛʜɪꜱ, ɴᴇᴇᴅʟᴇꜱꜱ ᴛᴏ ꜱᴀʏ, ᴅɪᴅ ɴᴏᴛ ᴡᴏʀᴋ ᴏᴜᴛ ᴡᴇʟʟ.**
**[u] ʀᴜʟᴇꜱ[/u]** 1. Obey all general forum rules. 2. This game is **Explicitly Bastard**. Welcome to the big time, friends. 3. Due to this game’s status as a bastard game, **Wisdom of the Mod** is in play. New players and known slankers will not be allowed to join for the sake of the rest of the players. 4. You ***may*** communicate with players about the game, so long as **Icibalus** and any **Spectator Machines** are included in this communication at all times. 5. You ***may*** quote and screenshot things from private messages directly into the thread, including things which were never actually said, or don't mean anything. Do this at your own risk. 6. Days will be 48 hours. Nights will be 24 hours. Unless otherwise stated. 7. Any rumours that I have taken inspiration from [color=gold]**MANTICHORA**[/color] and the other hosts of Neo Storpeo are totally baseless just because they happen to be true. [u]**ᴍᴇᴄʜᴀɴɪᴄꜱ**[/u] - You may not self-target with abilities unless otherwise stated. - Executions will be decided by **Plurality** unless otherwise stated. - **This game is highly weird and intricate. As such, I recommend you read your classcard and any other mechanical details I give you *carefully*.** [u]**ꜱɪɢɴᴜᴘꜱ**[/u] 1. ZoneQ11 - Dead 2. Mist1422 - Dead 3. Italy 4. ClonedCheese - Dead 5. Simon 6. PokemonKidRyan 7. an_gorta_pratai 8. Wazza - Dead 9. Apprentice 10. Marshal 11. [s]Ami[/s] Jane 12. Intensify - Dead 13. Arete - Dead 14. Centuries 15. KyoDaz - Dead 16. DatBird 16. SirDerpsALot - Dead 17. MaximusPrime - Dead 19. sulit 20. Light 21. Emilia - Dead [u]**ᴄʟᴏɴᴇꜱ**[/u] - TheBlueElixir - Amelia [u]**ꜱᴘᴇᴄᴛᴀᴛᴏʀꜱ**[/u] - Katze - Anstreim - Chloe
